properties.name: Dataverse - Login from IP not in the allow list
properties.description: Identifies logons from IPv4 addresses not matching IPv4 subnets maintained on an allow list. This analytics rule uses the NetworkAddresses watchlist template.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Dataverse - Login from IP not on the allow list in {{InstanceUrl}}
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Sign-in activity detected in {{InstanceUrl}} from an IP {{ClientIp}} not on the allow list.
